s: I liked the teal color and it seemed to be well made, just like the other Tignanello purses that I have owned. Sadly, I had to return the purse; it was too large for me. My mistake, I should have checked the measurements of the purse. I plan to order another Tignanello, I trust the brand.

t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: Tignanello Perfect 10 Shopper, Watermelon
s: I love the Tignanello brand so I want to make it clear that this purse was well made and all around wonderful. Except for the color. I ordered Maize and on screen it's a pleasant yellow toned color. In person, it is a dull and rather putrid looking color. I decided to send it back.

s: I am a Tignanello hand bag girl ! The first one I had just wore out after 10 years of wear and tear! If you use a full size wallet then go with the larger size.
